byline.contributor: Nida Najar contributed reporting from New Delhi.

abstract: New constitution is approved by large majority of Nepal’s Constituent Assembly over objections of southern and westerners, 40 of whom have died in protests over provincial boundaries.
lead_paragraph: The new charter was supported by 507 of 601 lawmakers in the country’s Constituent Assembly. It goes into effect Sunday.

headline.main: Assembly in Nepal Approves New Constitution
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Nepal: New Constitution Is Approved

snippet: The new charter was supported by 507 of 601 lawmakers in the country’s Constituent Assembly. It goes into effect Sunday.
